show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: Statistics: Adjusted, Massaged And Manipulated
content:
The economy is clearly headed down and the government plus its mainstream media are desperately trying to cover up the… reality.
Listen to several examples of this.
The story of Ex-Im Bank.
Anecdotal evidence of abandonment and decay at America’s strip malls.
Companies repurchasing their shares – right at the top!
Corporate insiders, however, are doing the opposite.
They are selling their shares.
They are in the ideal position to know with devastating accuracy the true nature of their companies’ fortunes.
The White House intruder with a knife!
Joshua Pollard believes real estate prices are about to collapse.
None of the politicians has understood the reasons for the crisis.
They are all utterly ignorant.
More on how we know that the financial crisis is not even close to being over.
The flotation of Alibaba, the largest IPO in history.
